column1: '''√Åtaremma''' ("Pater noster" in [[Quenya]]) is [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s Quenya translation of the [[Lord's Prayer (disambiguation)
column2: Lord's Prayer]]. Different versions of the prayer were published in [[Vinyar Tengwar 43
column3: ''Vinyar Tengwar'', no. 43]], edited by [[Patrick H. Wynne]], [[Arden R. Smith]], and [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
